categories: Category:Imperial II-class Star Destroyers of the Galactic Empire

nodes.text: The Avarice was an Imperial II-class Star Destroyer. During the Battle of Hoth, former clone trooper X2 breached the ship. In the battleship he found his "brother" X1. They dueled in the Star Destroyer. "Avarice" was destroyed during the battle by explosives Grey Squadron had planted.
